article_title: The ACA Exchanges Are Being Sabotaged -- By The ACA

article_metadata.description: One of the reasons that ACA Exchange plans are losing money is their inability to attract enough healthy enrollees. Healthy people are, disproportionately, young people. And large numbers of young adults don’t have to enroll in ACA Exchange plans – because the ACA mandates that their parents’ employer provide them with coverage, and that coverage is almost invariably priced lower.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
